ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo, mèŋ Pɔ̂ɔ gẅie n gee ndátsǎŋ ńtí nue mèŋ saʼá nò Yěsô Keleto mbwó pi pie pi te pà Yúndà wɔ́.
en: For this reason, I, Paul, the prisoner   of Christ Jesus on behalf of you Gentiles #— #

ngiemboon: Á ge gǎa wɔ́ɔ, mbà pi la júʼ ngie Ssé zɔ la náa yɔɔn fàʼ mbwó mèŋ, légwɔ́ gie e faʼa yɔɔn fàʼ pi zẅɛ́ʼ. À lɔ̌ɔn ńdɔgɔ ńcÿó pɔ́ gʉm yɔ́ɔn.
en: assuming you have heard about the administration of God’s grace that he gave me for you.

ngiemboon: À la kyɛ́ʼte mmó gie á la zɔɔn ńdyeen menÿɔ́g pʉ̀a lyeen, ńnyɛɛ wɔ́ɔn, páʼ n zɔ̌ɔn ńŋweʼe tsɛ̀ɛ yɔɔn ŋwàʼne éshwóŋo gẅí la. N kaa ŋweʼe á sag wɔ́.
en: The mystery was made known to me by revelation,   as I have briefly written above.

ngiemboon: Pi ge tóŋo yɔɔn ŋwàʼne, é júʼ ntí gie n dɔg ńzsé ntsem gie ee na nò Keleto.
en: By reading this you are able to understand my insight into the mystery of Christ.

ngiemboon: E Ssé la te kyɛ́ʼte yɔɔn ntsem ye, á mbwó pʉ̀a mesoŋ pe fʉ̀ʼʉmvfò wɔ́. Á ké ńgwɔ́ fʉ̀ʼɔɔn, mbà à gÿo à Zẅìge yé shʉ̀ashʉ̀a ńkyɛ́ʼte nò ya yɛ̌, á mbwó pʉ̀a pie à la tsɔ́ʼɔ wɔ́b, ńdɔg ńgÿo megàŋntúm Yěsô, mbɔɔ pie à la lɔgɔ wɔ́b ńgÿo pʉ̀a pie é ge néŋe tsẅii nkʉ̀ gẅie é fóo mbwó yé.
en: This was not made known to people   in other generations as it is now revealed to his holy apostles and prophets  # 3:5 1Co 12:28–29; Eph 2:20 by the Spirit:

ngiemboon: Entsem ŋwɛ́ eyɔɔn: á fó na nkʉ̀ mbòŋo, epʉ̀a pie é té pà Yúndà wɔ́, é gẅiin wɔ́b tÿɔgɔ́ na shúm sie Ssé la kaʼa mbwó pʉ̀a pé pà Yúndà. Pɔ́ ée mekèm tàʼ mbùm nnɛ́, ńgíŋ ńgẅiin yɔ́b nò na mmó gie Ssé la fó na Yěsô Keleto, ńkaʼa mbwó pʉ̀a mesoŋ.
en: The Gentiles are coheirs, members of the same body, and partners in the promise   in Christ Jesus through the gospel.

ngiemboon: E Ssé la cÿó gʉm yɔ́ɔn tá ńdɔgɔ wɔ́ɔn ńgÿo ngàŋafàʼ, létsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo. À la lɔg pɔ́ ngʉ̀ʼ ye tá ńgÿo púʼu.
en: I was made a servant of this gospel by the gift of God’s grace that was given to me by the working of his power.

ngiemboon: Tà mbɔɔ páʼ n gee tsetsɛ̀ɛ pʉ̀a Ssé metsèm ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ nzsònzèm, à ka ké ńzẅíŋ zẅíŋ ngie mèŋ zɔ gʉa ńtsẅi nkʉ̀ mbòŋo mbwó pʉ̀a pie é té pà Yúndà wɔ́, ńdaʼte pì te mag gie áa na nò Keleto.
en: This grace was given to me #— #the least of all the saints #— #to proclaim to the Gentiles the incalculable riches   of Christ,

ngiemboon: Mbɔɔ páʼ n ge nyɛɛ mángyɛ̌, mé zsé páʼ Ssé ge gÿo ammó gie à la láʼ ńzáb, mbà á ka zɔɔn ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ ntsem la, ge pumte púʼu. Yé Ssé gẅie à la nyɛte kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ, à la lÿoon yɛ̌ nò tà ńkú fʉ̀ʼɔɔn,
en: and to shed light for all about the administration of the mystery hidden for ages in God who created   all things.

ngiemboon: ńnyɛɛ púʼu, ńzsé ngie metándá shúm sie ée tàa tÿǒ ńgẅiin tʉ̀, mbɔɔ metʉ̀ ntsèm mie ée tàa tÿǒ, ge zẅɛ́ʼɛ cúʼtè pʉ̀a Keleto, é zsé nò na legye Ssé tà cʉ́me.
en: This is so that God’s multi-faceted wisdom   may now be made known through the church to the rulers and authorities in the heavens.  # 3:10 Eph 1:3,20; 2:6; 6:12; Php 2:10

ngiemboon: E Ssé ka gÿo páʼɔɔn, á lɔgɔ ḿbumte na mmó gie à la záb tà ńnyé pɔ́ te nyɛte njÿó, ngie à ge láʼ fó na Cʉ̀apʉ̀a wege Yěsô Keleto, é gÿo yɛ̌ mmó.
en: This is according to his eternal purpose   accomplished in Christ Jesus our Lord.

ngiemboon: Páʼ pege la nnɛ́, ḿbiŋ ńzáb ntʉ́m na yé Keleto la, pege gẅiin páʼ ngwɔ́ pege gʉa lejʉ́ŋ Ssé tà tsɔ́ mmó le wégè táte, pege ké le pɔ́g.
en: In him we have boldness and confident access   through faith in him.  # 3:12 Or through his faithfulness

ngiemboon: Páʼ Ssé ka gÿo púʼu la, mèŋ sẅíŋte gẅí ngie tà pi gyá páʼ n ne ńgyá ngɔ́ʼ na twó sí, ńkʉ́a. Eyɛ̌ ngɔ́ʼ e ne ńkẅéte gẅí, ńgwɔ́ mbwó pi ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ cÿɔ̀ʼɔ lefùɔ.
en: So, then, I ask you not to be discouraged   over my afflictions on your behalf, for they are your glory.  # 3:13 Jn 5:44; 7:18; Rm 2:7; 1Pt 5:4

ngiemboon: Áa mmó gie á gÿo mèŋ kẅíʼte mvfò Ssé Tá
en: For this reason I kneel   before the Father  # 3:14 Other mss add of our Lord Jesus Christ

ngiemboon: gẅie metsìŋendá mie ée tÿǒ lepwó mbɔɔ mie ée ndùmo ssé tsetsáʼ ntsèm, é gwaa gwɔ́ wó ńzẅɛ́ʼɛ pɔ́ yé,
en: from whom every family in heaven and on earth is named.

ngiemboon: n né ńdúɔ mbwó yé ngie à lɔg páʼ legúʼ we fǎŋ tɛʼ la, ńzẅíŋ, ńgÿo Azẅìge yé náa gẅí tʉ̀ légwɔ́ gie ntʉ́m gẅí ge cwoŋo tʉte tɛʼ.
en: I pray that he may grant you, according to the riches   of his glory,  # 3:16 Lk 9:32; Jn 17:24; 2Co 3:18; 2Pt 3:18 to be strengthened with power  # 3:16 2Tm 1:7 in your inner being  # 3:16 Rm 7:22; Php 4:13 through his Spirit,

ngiemboon: Mèŋ gǐŋ ne sẅíŋte yé ngie à gÿo pi ké ne ńzába ntʉ́m pɔ́ na Yěsô Keleto. Keleto lɔg púʼu, ńké ńne ńnéŋe ńgwɔ́ pɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m gẅí. N giŋé ne sẅíŋte ngie à gÿo pi kwoŋ Ssé, ḿbiŋ ńgẅiin nkwòŋe tsetsɛ̀ɛ pi, à cʉa púʼu, pi tyé ńtʉ páʼ tÿǒ gie menŋaŋ mé kúu ssé, mbɔɔ páʼ ndá gie acÿó á kúu ssé.
en: and that Christ may dwell in your hearts through faith. I pray that you, being rooted and firmly established in love,

ngiemboon: Á cʉa púʼu, pi kuʼu légwɔ́ gie ngwɔ́ pi lâ pʉ̀a Ssé metsèm pú ńjúʼ ntí gie nkwòŋe Keleto e fǎŋ púʼu, ésag púʼu, ńgʉa tÿǒ púʼu, ńkúu ssé púʼu.
en: may be able to comprehend with all the saints what is the length and width, height and depth of God’s love,

ngiemboon: Wɔɔn aa páʼ n ne sẅíŋte Ssé púʼu. Á ge fó mǒ, pi kuʼu lézsé páʼ nkwòŋe Keleto ee púʼu, tà mbɔɔ páʼ e cʉa zsénò ntsèm. Pi ge gwɔ́ tà zsé yɛ̌ nkwòŋe, ammó ntsèm gie áa ntʉ́m Ssé, à gíŋ ńgwɔ́ tsɛ̀ɛ ntʉ́m gẅí tà mmó le mǒ zág.
en: and to know Christ’s love that surpasses knowledge, so that you may be filled with all the fullness of God.

ngiemboon: Yé Ssé, à kuʼu légÿo kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ na pege, ńgÿo tà ńkwaʼ ḿbú ńtɔ́g páʼ pege ne ńdúɔ, mbɔɔ páʼ pege ne ńkwaŋa. À gwaa gÿo, ńdɔg pɔ́ ngʉ̀ʼ ye gie e faʼa tsɛ̀ɛ mentʉ́m mégè.
en: Now to him who is able   to do above and beyond all that we ask or think  # 3:20 Mk 14:36 according to the power  # 3:20 Rm 15:13; 16:25; 2Tm 1:7; Jd 24 that works in us #— #

ngiemboon: Agùʼte gwɔ́ mbwó yé tsɛ̀ɛ cúʼtè pʉ̀a Keleto, ńcʉa na Yěsô Keleto, á na mengùʼ mengùʼ, té záʼa pàa! Amɛn.
en: to him be glory in the church and in Christ Jesus to all generations, forever and ever. Amen.
